p: In parallel a Maximum Parsimony tree was built using the fast tree inference and bootstrap approximation offered by MPBoot ( Hoang et al., 2018). MPBoot was run on the alignment to reconstruct the Maximum Parsimony tree and to assess branch support following 1000 replicates (âˆ’ bb 1000). The resulting Maximum Parsimony treefile was used, together with the input alignment, to rapidly identify recurrent mutations (homoplasies) using HomoplasyFinder ( Crispell et al., 2019).
